MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 postcode area of Little Budworth, affecting properties in Whitehall Lane and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:27PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:48PM on 18th October 2020
